title: Weak Total Ramification and Semistable Reduction
abstract:
Let $K$ be a complete discretely valued field. An extension $L/K$ is weakly
totally ramified if the residue extension is purely inseparable. We prove that
elliptic curves over $K$ and dynamical systems on $\mathbb{P}^1_K$ achieve
semistable reduction over a separable weakly totally ramified extension of $K$.
The key ingredient is a refinement of a result of Ax on the approximation of
roots of univariate polynomials by elements that generate $p$-extensions. All
of our arguments are constructive.
